8_XXoEk9tibiBFAC7oBwjg.text: Standard subway, reliable taste wherever you go. It's my favourite.

9UhZx_L9n170Hf5AWZE71A.text: This is just a regular old subway really and even though no matter where you are every subway smells the same and no matter what subway you get they all just taste the same - I just can't help but like them, well, as long as my sub comes with plenty of Southwest sauce. I usually go for the sub of the day as at 1.99 it's a bargain, and like I said, no matter what you get they all taste the same anyway.  I popped in here the other day, but instead of a sub I opted for the nachos that have recently appeared on the menu. Plenty of nachos, lots of cheese and a generous helping of salsa and jalapenos too - no complaints from me!

photos.caption: Photo of Subway - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. http://www.subway.co.uk/

2FeOfg7oQOpZDGb2I_FGug.text: Hey it is a chain but that said what they do, they do well. beats a kebab on the way home and it is always tasty and dribbles down you chin.
